snippet.title: Euro Truck Simulator 2: New 2022 Video Trailer
snippet.description:
Travel across Europe as king of the road, a trucker who delivers important cargo across impressive distances! With dozens of cities to explore, hundreds of customizations, multiplayer Convoy mode, and many other features, there will rarely be a dull moment on your journey to the top. If you've got what it takes to be part of an elite trucking force, get behind the wheel and prove it!

Get the demo of the game now!
www.eurotrucksimulator2.com

Latest ETS2/ATS news 👉 https://blog.scssoft.com
---
